english.segment1: We were young, And none of us know quite what to say, But the feeling moved. Among us in silence anyway. Slowly we had made. Quite a change--. Somewhere we had crossed a big line. Down upon our knees, We had tasted holy wine, And no one could sway us. In a life time.
english.segment2: Purer than the sky, Behind the rain. Falling down all around us, Calling out from a boundless love. Love had lit a fire;. We were the flame. Burning into the darkness, Shining out from inside us.
english.segment3: Not a word. And no one had to say we were changed. Nothing else we lived through. Would ever be same the same, Knowing the truth. That we had gained.
english.segment4: Purer than the sky, Behind the rain. Falling down all around us, Calling out from a boundless love. Love had lit a fire;. We were the flame. Burning into the darkness, Shining out from inside us.
english.segment5: Stay with me. Make it ever new, So time will not undo, As the years go by, How I need to see. That's still me.
